name: Apocalypse Radiation Island 3D
description:
Survive at nuclear apocalypse radiation island 3d! Play hardcore survival game!

You on lost apocalypse island. Can you survive? Can you defeat mutants or hungry animals?
Can you escape from this stranded island?
Try to survive at this game now!
Find items, use instruments, clear island from aggressive mutants!

+ Survival island 3d simulator
+ Realistic survival 3d world
+ A lot of enemies
+ Shooter adventure at lost radiation island like USSR Chernobyl or Pripiat
+ Smart bot system
+ Many weapons
+ Weather and day changes
+ good visual and sounds effects
